column4: how to know the maximum amount of ram that my laptop will support ?
search for you make and model on line

not important unless the computer is old
ok ! we don't care about brand too ? i can have a 2Gb samsung and a 4G crucial for example or it is better the same brand for the two sticks ?
better yes I don't know if you can mix sizes that well.  Also it's best if they are the same speed.
It probably won't hurt to try it.
if i had them i'll try !! but i need to buy them first :) i'll take a two sticks kit. anyway thanks for your help
the command dmidecode --type memory returns "Physical Memory Array Maximum Capacity: 4 GB Number Of Devices: 2" is it 4 GB by slot or for both ?
so you need 2 sticks of 2 gb
